body_html:
Did you try bjascob's suggestion?
You can follow the steps given below to create virtual environment:
virtualenv -p python3 venv-tf-new
source venv-tf-new/bin/activate
pip3 install tensorflow

body:
Did you try bjascob's suggestion?
You can follow the steps given below to create virtual environment:
virtualenv -p python3 venv-tf-new    
source venv-tf-new/bin/activate   
pip3 install tensorflow
